name: Adaptability
summary: Increases the STAB (Same Type Ability Bonus) from 1.5x damage to 2x.
viability:
This is an incredible ability, no matter who the Pokémon is. Mega Lucario was banned to Ubers, in part because of this ability. 
	
	Just for a Frame of reference:
	
	- Close Combat is 120 Base Power. With normal STAB it's 180, and with Adaptability, that number rises to 240 damage!
	
	- Specially Variant Mega Lucario (252 SpA) vs. Specially Defensive Sylveon (252 HP/SpA): Flash Cannon is a definite 2HKO after Leftovers recovery.
			
	The other great user is Crawdaunt. With Aqua Jet and Knock Off, Crawdaunt becomes a scary holder of Adaptability. Other great holders are ChoIce Scarf Porygon-Z, ChoIce Banded/Life Orb Basculin, and ChoIce Specs Dragalge.
	
	Any Pokémon with this ability instantly becomes a threat due to almost every Pokémon having a STAB move. This usually will be the ability of choIce when having to decide on a set.
